name: Shadhavar
languages: understands Elvish and Umbral but canâ€™t speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shadhavar makes one Gore attack and one Hooves attack.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Darkness Aura (1/Day)
actions.desc: A 15-foot radius of magical darkness extends out from the shadhavar, moves with it, and spreads around corners. The darkness lasts as long as the shadhavar maintains concentration, up to 10 minutes (as if concentrating on a spell). Darkvision can't penetrate this darkness, and no natural light can illuminate it. If any of the darkness overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell creating the light is dispelled.

special_abilities.name: Magic Horn
special_abilities.desc: The shadhavar's Gore attacks are magical.

special_abilities.name: Shadesight
special_abilities.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the shadhavar's darkvision.
